chapters.title: Chapter 7:  The Plan for Arad Doman
chapters.info: King Alsalam Saeed Almadar, p. 132—King of Arad Doman. He had been a good ruler for over twenty years, though the Council had recently smuggled him out of Bandar Eban—after leaving the city, he seemed to have taken on the notion that he was the Rebirth of Artur Hawkwing. He is believed to either be dead or one of Graendal's playthings.
